nodes.text: This unnamed scout trooper was an Imperial scout trooper who served and died during the Evacuation of Yavin. During the battle, he was able to infiltrate the Rebel Alliance's temple base and obtain a datapad containing secret information about the Rebels. Commander Col Serra discovered this and ordered his fighting unit, Renegade Squadron, to kill the scout trooper and bring the datapad back to the base. The squadron succeeded in their mission and killed the Imperial, and brought the datapad back to the temple.
